Address.label: Address
Address.value: 10 CANAL STREET,SUITE 104, BRISTOL, Pennsylvania, 19007, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: William Penn Bancorporation operates as an independent community financial services provider. The bank offers traditional banking and related financial services to individual, business, and government customers. Through its branch and automated teller machine network, the bank offers a full array of commercial and retail financial services, including; the taking of time, savings, and demand deposits; the making of the commercial, consumer, and mortgage loans; and the providing of other financial services.

value.name: Amy J. Logan
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
